title: Gunman in the Streets (restored, colorized) (1950, crime, imdb score: 6.6)

sources.title: Gunman in the Streets (restored, colorized) (1950, crime, imdb score: 6.6)
sources.description: Gunman in the Streets (Canadian title Gangster at Bay ) is a French/US-produced 1950 black-and-white film noir directed by Frank Tuttle and starring Dane Clark and Simone Signoret . Unreleased for theatrical screening in the US, the film was titled Time Running Out for its US television syndication from 1963. The low-budget B-movie was shot on location in Paris, France . A French-language version of the film (directed by Borys Lewin ) was released in France under the title The Hunted .
